item.description:
Change Location:Revolution Restaurant 200 High St.Boston.Easy by Public Transportation.

Revolution Restaurant will offer complimentary appetizers up to Twenty members

I would like to open the meet-up to men also.

Looking for one or two assistant organizers. Preferably a Wardrobe Makeovers for men and women

I am hopping with the change of the day I will see more of you.
Wishing you a safe, glamorous and prosperous day
Maria Capuano
item.how_to_find_us: ask the hostess for Maria Capuano

group.name: Boston Beauty, Fashion and Photo Stylist

item.name: The Boston Make Over Meetup Group Monthly Meetup
